[[Elizabeth Stevens]] (granddaughter) |relationships = |actor = }}'''Mr Stevens Sr.''' was the father of [[Paul Stevens]] and [[Ms. Stevens]] and the paternal grandfather of [[Elizabeth Stevens]]. ==History== Mr. Stevens Sr. got married at an unknown time to Mrs. Stevens and they had two children, [[Paul Stevens|Paul]] and an [[Ms. Stevens|unnamed daughter]]. Stevens's relationship with his son was terrible. He didn't show him much affection, never hugged him, always saying "I'm a little busy here, Paul." and got him a plastic chicken you hop around him rather than a Big Wheel like he wanted when Paul was 6. He died at an unknown period from an unknown cause. This is evident as Paul says in [[The One With The Ring]] "I miss my dad.". ==Relationships== ===Wife=== Mr. Stevens Sr. most likely had a good relationship with his wife. ===Children=== As stated above, Stevens Sr.'s relationship with his son, Paul was a terrible one. He never showed him much affection and was apparently quite neglectful of him. In "[[The One With The Ring]]", Paul told [[Chandler Bing|Chandler]] that he misses his dad.
